title: Create insurance broker homepage for Jonathan Ayan

requirements.summary: Create professional homepage introducing Jonathan Ayan as a life and annuity insurance broker in Miami, Florida
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays Jonathan Ayan's name prominently

file_operations.description: Replace default app content with a professional homepage structure featuring a hero section that prominently displays Jonathan Ayan's name, Miami Florida location, and professional introduction as a life and annuity insurance broker. Wire in the generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x600.png as the hero section background.

Create a hero section component that displays Jonathan Ayan's name as the main heading, subtitle identifying him as a life and annuity insurance broker, and location text showing Miami, Florida. Use the generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-background.dim_1920x600.png as the section background with appropriate overlay for text readability.

requirements.summary: Display section showcasing A-rated insurance companies represented including Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, and Forrester
acceptanceCriteria: Section lists at least: Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, Forrester
Companies are presented in a clean, organized format
Section emphasizes A-rated status of companies

file_operations.description: Create a companies section component that displays a grid or list of A-rated insurance companies including Mutual of Omaha, FNG, Transamerica, Ethos, and Forrester. Include a heading that emphasizes the A-rated status of these companies and present them in a clean, professional layout.
Import and render the CompaniesSection component below the hero section in the homepage layout.

requirements.summary: Create services section explaining life insurance and annuities offerings with clear assistance descriptions

file_operations.description: Create a services section component with two main service cards: one for life insurance and one for annuities. Each card should include a heading, description of the service, and explanation of available assistance. Wire in the generated icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/life-insurance-icon.dim_64x64.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/annuities-icon.dim_64x64.png to visually represent each service.
Import and render the ServicesSection component below the CompaniesSection in the homepage layout.

requirements.summary: Include contact information section for potential clients to reach Jonathan Ayan

file_operations.description: Create a contact section component that displays contact information for Jonathan Ayan including relevant contact methods such as email and phone placeholders. Present the information in a clear, accessible format with appropriate labels.
Import and render the ContactSection component below the ServicesSection at the bottom of the homepage layout.

requirements.summary: Design homepage with professional, trustworthy visual theme using navy blue, gold accents, crisp whites, clean typography, and stable layout
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme uses professional, trust-building colors
Design is consistent across all homepage sections

file_operations.description: Extend the Tailwind theme with a professional color palette featuring navy blue as primary color, gold for accents, and crisp white for backgrounds. Add custom colors that convey trust and stability appropriate for financial services.

Define global typography styles using professional, clean fonts. Set base font properties, heading styles, and ensure consistent spacing that conveys stability and expertise throughout the application.
Apply the professional color scheme and typography to the main app container. Ensure consistent spacing, padding, and layout structure across all sections to convey stability and expertise.
